scripts.build: npm run jade && npm run scss && npm run uglify
scripts.scss: node_modules/node-sass/bin/node-sass src/scss/style.scss static/style_no_prefix.css --source-map static/style.css.map && node_modules/autoprefixer/autoprefixer static/style_no_prefix.css -o static/style.css && rm static/style_no_prefix.css
scripts.sync-n-watch: npm run watch & npm run sync
scripts.uglify: node_modules/uglify-js/bin/uglifyjs node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.js node_modules/bootstrap-sass/assets/javascripts/bootstrap.js node_modules/jquery-smooth-scroll/jquery.smooth-scroll.js bower_components/typed.js/js/typed.js src/js/site.js --output static/site.js --compress --mangle --source-map static/site.js.map --source-map-url site.js.map
scripts.watch: node_modules/watch/cli.js 'npm run jade' src/jade & node_modules/watch/cli.js 'npm run scss' src/scss & node_modules/watch/cli.js 'npm run uglify' src/js
